com.palamida.common.base

Class MoreStrings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.palamida.common.base.MoreStrings

  • public final class MoreStrings
extends Object
    Static utility methods that operate on or return Strings.
    Author:
    Zhenya Leonov
    See Also:
    Strings, CharMatcher, Joiner, Splitter

        public static boolean startsWithIgnoreCase(String string,
                           String prefix,
                           int toffset)
        Returns true if the substring of string beginning at the specified index starts with the specified prefix, ignoring case differences; else false.
        Parameters:
        string - the specified string
        prefix - the prefix to look for
        toffset - where to begin looking for the prefix
        Returns:

      • readLines

        public static Iterable<String> readLines(String string)
                                  throws IOException
        Returns all of the lines from a string. The lines do not include line-termination characters, but do include other leading and trailing whitespace.
        Parameters:
        string - the specified string
        Returns:
        return all of the lines from a string
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O exception occurs
